title: Matchups that even Bronze V player would win vs Diamond player
body:
Ahri vs Akali - that matchup is so freaking easy for Ahri. All what Ahri has to do is to push and if Akali missplays only once, if she goes for cs with aa all what ahri has to do is to charm her and get fb.

Mordekaiser vs Fizz - that matchup is so freaking easy for Mordekaiser. All what he has to do is the push and if Fizz uses Q on him he just can faceroll over his keyboard and get a kill

Katarina vs LeBlanc - that matchup is so freaking easy for Katarina. She has no mana, all what she has to do is to spam Q on LB and buy some pots for sustain. Her harras will be always pure win because LB has mana and once Kat reaches 6, dashes and none of this crap would save lb.

Swain vs leBlanc - that matchup is so freaking easy for Swain. All what he has to is to harras early and after 6 when ever LB tried to engage he can all in.

Garen vs Akali - that matchup is so freaking easy for Garen. All what he has to do is to Q+E and when ever akali uses Q he can just W.

Fiora vs Nasus - that matchup is so freaking easy for Fiora. The fact that Fiora outscales Nasus is even worse for him because he can't do anything early because of her insane harras and mobility and if he even tries to chase her level 6 he has no chance + she can block his Q.

Irelia vs Kennen -  that matchup is so freaking easy for Irelia because she is Irelia.

> [{quoted}](name=Mischief Maker,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=0GEmwEfH,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-06-22T06:11:57.386+0000)
>
> Ahri vs Akali - that matchup is so freaking easy for Ahri. All what Ahri has to do is to push and if Akali missplays only once, if she goes for cs with aa all what ahri has to do is to charm her and get fb.

A diamond wouldn't misplay to enough of a degree that a bronze V would recognize what they're supposed to do. A bronze V player does not understand how to push or why to push.

> A diamond wouldn't misplay to enough of a degree that a bronze V would recognize what they're supposed to do. A bronze V player does not understand how to push or why to push.

 u have to push when u wanna get early advantage or when u wanna stop enemy from freezing, everyone knows that, even low levels, let alone bronze v

the most untrue thing i have ever read. if you have basic macro understanding you shouldn't even be in bronze.

> [{quoted}](name=Quepha,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=0GEmwEfH,comment-id=000500000000,timestamp=2016-06-22T06:49:16.344+0000)
>
> You have no idea how bad bronze V are
> Or even how bad low levels are

I'm Bronze and I can tell you, that you will meet a lot of people who will freeze the lane to zone you. Hell, I fuckin do it somethimes. Lots will shove when they realize they have better wave clear so they can roam bot and get double kills. I think you're mistaking Bronze for level 10s or something.
but do you wanna push into lvl 3 jungle ganks or heavy mid oriented team comps? its not so cut and dry as push to get advantage and win lane.

Malzahar {{champion:90}}  vs {{champion:16}}  Soraka

Darius {{champion:122}} vs {{champion:89}}  Leona

Aurelion Sol {{champion:136}}  vs {{champion:201}}  Braum

{{champion:136}}  vs {{champion:76}} 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KCymAMxoFNU
That is so troll...

I thought you were gonna list some hard counters like fizz into tf or kassadin into ziggs/xerath etc.  

Ahri vs akali is anyones game after level 6.  Mostly skill as both are assasins with a lot of mobility and thus the potential for either champ to do no dmg or 100-0  based on skillshots and ultis. 

Mord vs fizz is leaning to mord but really all fizz would do is just roam or wait for jungler to gank with ulti.

kat vs lb is the same as the first one. Both are high dmg mobile assasins. Skill wins.

swain vs lb.  Swain should get shat on.  His q or w should never hit due to her jumps and e is not enough compared to early levels lb.  He would die again and again until he completed spirit visage. Then he could just ignore her but he should never be able to catch her to kill her.

garen vs akali, yeah garen stomps.

fiora vs nasus, yep

irelia vs kennen, irelia stomp although keep in mind irelia strength is based on triforce so in 5 patches she might be bad again if its nerfed.

Also a diamond player will probably still be able to win a hard countered lane because in league it is possible to still win lane if you outplay hard enough.

> I thought you were gonna list some hard counters like fizz into tf or kassadin into ziggs/xerath etc.  

fizz vs kassadin is a skill matchup. fizz used to hard counter him before kass rework but right now kass is too tanky. ziggs can win vs fizz, at least in s4 it wasn't that hard with {{item:3028}} to survive fizz combo and insane early harras. same goes to xerath except xerath has no mobility, but he has stun.

> Ahri vs akali is anyones game after level 6.  Mostly skill as both are assasins with a lot of mobility and thus the potential for either champ to do no dmg or 100-0  based on skillshots and ultis. 

like i said easiest matchup ever. ahri has insane mobility, she is ranged and has good wave clear. akali is none of that

> Mord vs fizz is leaning to mord but really all fizz would do is just roam or wait for jungler to gank with ulti.

if fizz roams he would lose his tower because morde pushes hard

> kat vs lb is the same as the first one. Both are high dmg mobile assasins. Skill wins.

lb q+w costs too much mana, kat can outtrade without losing anything

 > swain vs lb.  Swain should get shat on.  His q or w should never hit due to her jumps and e is not enough compared to early levels lb.  He would die again and again until he completed spirit visage. Then he could just ignore her but he should never be able to catch her to kill her. 

he just have to spam bird and wait for 6, maybe give up some cs early if necessary

> Also a diamond player will probably still be able to win a hard countered lane because in league it is possible to still win lane if you outplay hard enough.

not in these matchups

Dude ive beaten hard counter matchups with skill at my own level and levels below me so for a diamond to be able to win a lane with a hard counter is a pretty good chance 

 Even If they can't win that specific lane they will usually just roam and win others lanes or take objecitives or call for ganks to make the hard counter null.  

They also know how to come back from a game or lane and how to close out at game so they are almost always the ones to bet on to win.
{{champion:1}} vs{{champion:23}}   that matchup is so freaking easy for Annie.

Ahri vs Akali: Akali just has to play safe and farm under tower til 6. Bait Ahri's Charm, all in her. They each have 3 Dashes, guess who's does more dmg? If Ahri plays too far back, Akali just roams and snowballs.

Fizz vs Morde: I have never played this matchup personally, but I have watched a fizz wreck morde. I dunno.

Katarina vs Leblanc: This is a skill matchup. period. Kat will not run out of mana true, this gives her an edge. but LB's burst can be just as strong if she is even or ahead.

Swain vs Leblanc: Never played this matchup. Never seen this matchup.

Garen vs Akali: I have been on both sides of this matchup. Garen SHOULD win this one, but if Akali gets some early successful ganks, she snowballs VERY hard. Probably still wont do a ton vs Garen 1v1 unless she is VERY ahead, but will wreck the rest of his team.

Fiora vs Nasus: Fiora has an early edge and does scale well, but Nasus Wither is op. I have been on both sides of this matchup and have won/lost in both scenarios. 

Irelia vs Kennen: Kennen unless he is stupid. :P this is a skill matchup. Late game, Irelia will probably win.

Implying the bronze player would even know what to do even in those matchups.

Look up a league video named 5 Golds vs. 3 Challengers and youÂ´ll get what i mean.
